selectedVerses.text: Seven priests shall bear seven trumpets of rams' horns before the ark. On the seventh day you shall march around the city seven times, and the priests shall blow the trumpets.

Then Achish called David and said to him, "As the LORD lives, you have been honest, and to me it seems right that you should march out and in with me in the campaign. For I have found nothing wrong in you from the day of your coming to me to this day. Nevertheless, the lords do not approve of you.
The torrent Kishon swept them away, the ancient torrent, the torrent Kishon. March on, my soul, with might!
For behold, I am raising up the Chaldeans, that bitter and hasty nation, who march through the breadth of the earth, to seize dwellings not their own.
So Miriam was shut outside the camp seven days, and the people did not set out on the march till Miriam was brought in again.
